content: **knitted jumper for men in drops soft tweed or drops daisy the piece is worked bottom up with cables double neck and sewn-in sleeves sizes s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern st-029 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials ** drops soft tweed from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 550-600-650-700-750-800 g colour 10 denim jeans or use drops daisy from garnstudio belong to yarn group b 650-750-750-850-900-950 g colour 24 cobalt blue needles drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch / 34 row in height with pattern a 1 = 10 x 10 cm the pattern sections on the front piece are approx 34 cm in width note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
